title: Modelling the impacts of climate change on agrochemical fate and transport by water on a catchment scale
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Poornima Nagesh, Matthias Gassmann, Josef Eitzinger, Hugo J. de Boer, Oreane Y. Edelenbosch, Detlef P. van Vuuren, Stefan C. Dekker
